definition: to do/to grow/to write or compose/to pretend/to regard as/to feel/writings or works

sentences.english: The Grain Budding shows that crops that will ripen in summer start to show plump seeds.
sentences.chinese: 小满表示在夏季成熟的农作物籽粒开始饱满了。

sentences.english: There lies a vast extension of golden crops before us.
sentences.chinese: 一望无际的金灿灿的农作物展现在我们的眼前。

sentences.english: Last summer, a hailstorm damaged the ten mu of good land.
sentences.chinese: 冰雹毁坏了农作物，甚至打死了牲畜。

sentences.english: At last, the forcasting equation of the plant output was supplied.
sentences.chinese: 最后给出了农作物产量的预测预报方程。

sentences.english: That is because honey bees pollinate food crops of all kinds.
sentences.chinese: 因为我们大部分的农作物都是靠它们来授粉的。

sentences.english: Determination and profile of crop nouns.
sentences.chinese: 农作物名物词的确定及概貌。

sentences.english: At last, the forcasting equation of the plant output wass…
sentences.chinese: 最后给出了农作物产量的预测预报方程。

sentences.english: Germplasm resources resistant to pests is the base of breeding resistant varieties.
sentences.chinese: 抗虫种质资源是进行农作物抗虫育种的基础。

sentences.english: Windbreaks not only protect land and crops from the wind.
sentences.chinese: 防风林不仅可以保护土地和农作物免受风灾。

sentences.english: Some cooperatives, for example, raise money for research into important crops.
sentences.chinese: 例如，一些合作社筹集资金研究重要农作物。

sentences.english: The dry spell blighted the crops.
sentences.chinese: 干旱期使农作物枯萎了。

sentences.english: Some of our most important crop plants are ones that are not very efficient at photosynthesis.
sentences.chinese: 而我们一些重要农作物的光合作用效率不高。

sentences.english: He was granted many privileges to cultivate crops.
sentences.chinese: 他被给予许多特权来培育农作物。

sentences.english: Andfarmers can use camel west waste to fertilize their crops.
sentences.chinese: 农民能用骆驼的粪便来给农作物施肥。

sentences.english: Plant pathology (phytopathology) is dedicated to fighting plant diseases of all kinds.
sentences.chinese: 农作物病理学旨在对抗各种作物疾病。

sentences.english: Ability to estimate crop information from remotely sensed imagery is fundamental in precision agriculture.
sentences.chinese: 估计农作物遥感影像信息的能力是在精准农业的基础。
